name: Landwarren [Alpha 1.0]
description:
Landwarren: the complex byte-sized missile defense game!

Landwarren is a game that demands attention to detail, precise calculations and quick thinking. Instead of simply pointing and shooting at hazards with user friendly assistance, the operator of Landwarren must calculate and manually submit coordinates into a control system to target incoming hazards. Don't forget to manage the energy that is generated from nearby cities, lest you run out of  firepower to defend your planet.

Goal: Operate a Missile Control Tower in order to defend your planet from a chaotic series of disasters.

CONTROLS:

X: Start Game, Fire Missile.

Arrow Keys: Navigate Control Panel.
Number Pad: Type Values.

Escape: Restart Game, Exit Game.

By Reveremint (Calvert)
